revisions.rev:
This is a '''discography''' for the band '''[[Ruby (band)|Ruby]]'''
== Studio albums ==
===''Salt Peter''===
* released November 1, 1995; produced by [[Mark Walk]], [[Lesley Rankine]] * released on [[Work Records|WORK]]/[[Creation Records|Creation]] labels * recorded at Mommy's Cunt<ref name='NME Oldham'> {{cite web|url=http://www.creation<small>Records.com/archive/ruby/reviews.html |title=Creation Records - Ruby - Press Reviews |accessdate=2009-07-03 |last=Oldham |first=James |work=New Music Express }}</ref>, Butler, Soundhouse Studios, Seattle, WA, USA - June '94 to Jan '95 :''track listing:'' # "Flippin' Tha Bird" (4:09) <small>Rankine, Walk</small> # "Salt Water Fish" (3:29) <small>Rankine, Walk</small> # "Heidi" (4:04) <small>Rankine, Walk</small> # "[[Tiny Meat]]" (4:04) <small>Rankine, Walk</small> # "[[Paraffin (song)|Paraffin]]" (3:36) <small>Rankine, Walk</small> # "[[Hoops (song)|Hoops]]" (4:18) <small>Rankine, Walk</small> # "Pine" (4:08) <small>Rankine, Walk</small> # "Swallow Baby" (5:32) <small>Rankine</small> # "The Whole is Equal to the Sum of its Parts" (4:07) <small>Rankine</small> # "Bud" (4:19) <small>Rankine</small> # "Carondelet" (7:06) <small>Rankine, Walk, Gira, Ferguson, Atkins</small> :total length (48:24)
===''Short-Staffed at the Gene Pool''===
* released April 24, 2001; produced by Walk, Rankine * released on Thirsty Ear/Wichita labels :''track listing:'' # "Beefheart" (3:57) <small>Rankine, Walk</small> # "Queen of Denial" (3:13) <small>Rankine, Walk</small> # "Lilypad" (3:27) <small>Rankine, Walk</small> # "Waterside" (3:54) <small>Rankine, Walk</small> # "Lamplight" (4:26) <small>Rankine, Walk</small> # "Roses" (4:18) <small>Rankine, Walk</small> # "Grace" (3:31) <small>Rankine</small> # "Fly" (4:14) <small>Rankine, Walk</small> # "Cargo" (3:35) <small>Rankine, Walk</small> # "Sweet Is" (4:17) <small>Rankine, Walk</small> # "Fuse Again" (5:00) <small>Rankine, Walk</small> :''total length:'' (43:52)
== Remix albums == ===''Revenge, The Sweetest Fruit: Salt Peter Remixed''===
* released April 8, 1996 (US only); produced by Walk, Rankine * released on Creation/WORK labels * recorded at Mommy's Cunt, Butler, Soundhouse Studios, Seattle, WA, USA - June '94 to Jan '95 :''track listing:'' # "Flippin' tha Bird" (4:09) <small>Rankine, Walk</small> # "Salt Water Fish" (3:22) <small>Rankine, Walk</small> # "Heidi" (Scream Team remix) (7:51) <small>Rankine, Walk</small> # "Paraffin" (Red Snapper mix) (4:26) <small>Rankine, Walk</small> # "Hoops" (Da Lata remix) (4:49) <small>Rankine, Walk</small> # "Tiny Meat" (Meat for the Feet Dub) (6:25) <small>Rankine, Walk</small> # "Heidi" (Num Num mix) (8:27) <small>Rankine, Walk</small> # "Swallow Baby" (5:31) <small>Rankine</small> # "The Whole Is Equal to the Sum of Its Parts" (4:07) <small>Rankine</small> # "Bud" (Rootless mix) (7:05) <small>Rankine</small> # "Carondelet" (Don't Fear the remix) (5:10) <small>Rankine, Walk, Gira, Ferguson, Atkins</small> :''total length:'' (61:22)
===''Stroking the Full Length''===
* released October 29, 1996 (UK only); produced by Walk, Rankine * released on WORK/Creation labels * recorded at Mommy's Cunt, Butler, Soundhouse Studios, Seattle, WA, USA - June '94 to Jan '95 :''track listing:'' # "Swallow Baby" (Single Mix) (3:44) <small>Rankine</small> # "Hoops" ([[Eli Janney (musician)|Eli Janney]] Mix) (3:47) <small>Walk, Rankine</small> # "Flippin' Tha Bird" (Ceasefire mix) (5:03) <small>Walk, Rankine</small> # "Salt Water Fish" (Peshay Mix) (8:24) <small>Walk, Rankine</small> # "Tiny Meat" (meat for the feet dub) (6:27) <small>Walk, Rankine</small> # "The Whole is Equal to the Sum of its Parts" (Grantby mix) (4:18) <small>Rankine</small> :''total length:'' (31:43)
===''Altered and Proud, the Short Staffed Remixes''===
* released July 17, 2001; produced by Walk, Rankine * released on Thirsty Ear/Wichita labels :''track listing:'' # "Lilypad" (Take Me to the Hospital I Am Not a Fucking Frog remix by Kid 606) (4:48) <small>Walk, Rankine</small> # "Lamplight" (Bench and Doufos Parrrtay Mix! By Bench) (4:56) <small>Walk, Rankine</small> # "Queen of Denial" (Chow remix) (5:29) <small>Walk, Rankine</small> # "Waterside" (Deep in the Void mix by Aksum) (8:59) <small>Walk, Rankine</small> # "Grace" (Space remix by Schnieder Tm) (4:26) <small>Rankine</small> # "Beefheart" (Wauvenfold Remix) (4:17) <small>Walk, Rankine</small> # "Sweet Is" (Loop of the Fruit remix by Console) (5:04) <small>Walk, Rankine</small> # "Waterside" (Scotty remix) (4:19) <small>Walk, Rankine</small> # "Lilypad" (Max Tundra remix) (4:40) <small>Walk, Rankine</small> # "Grace" (Her Space Holiday remix) (4:31) <small>Rankine</small> :''total length:'' (51:29)
